page.title: 06EVERYDAY LIFE
page.content: DAVID CROSS 06.30 wake up and get dressed.At 07.00 sort the papers out (I own a village shop) and put them in the shop.At 07.30 have breakfast and walk the dog.At 08.00 open the shop which sells sweets food and other household things.At 09.00 the Post Office is opened for stamps and pensions.At 10.00 it is coffee time until 10.15.At 12.30 the shop and Post Office are closed for dinner.at 12.50 the dog is walked and fed.At 13.00 the shop is opened.At 15.00 it is coffee time until 15.15.At 18.30 the shop is shut for tea the The dog is walked and fed and I watch TV or go out or do the accounts. At 23.00 it is time to go to bed.
